list.value: default;;select s from Category s where s.status!=3 and s.categoryId!=1 and s.categoryType=1 order by s.categoryPath;;allow,all
contentCategories;;select s from Category s where s.status!=3 and s.categoryId!=1 and s.categoryType=2 and s.category.categoryId=? order by s.sortOrder;;allow,all
selectByType;;select s from Region s where s.regionType=? order by s.regionName asc;;allow,all;;hidden
selectByTypeAndStatus;;select s from Region s where s.regionType=? and s.status=? order by s.regionName asc;;allow,all;;hidden
default;;select s from Customer s where s.deleted=0 and s.appuserId>0 order by s.appuserId desc;;allow,all
sf_default;;select so from SalesOrder so where so.customer.appuserId=? and so.createTime >= ? order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
default;;select s from GiftCertificate s order by s.giftCertificateId desc;;allow,all
defaultState_Past;;select s from GiftCertificate s where (s.expireTime is not null and ? >= expireTime) order by s.giftCertificateId desc;;allow,all
defaultState_NotPast;;select s from GiftCertificate s where (s.expireTime is null or ? < s.expireTime ) and status = ? order by s.giftCertificateId desc;;allow,all
default;;select s from Wrap s order by s.wrapId desc;;allow,all
default;;select s from AdPositionType s order by s.adPositionTypeId desc;;allow,all
default;;select s from AppAdmin s where s.deleted=0 order by s.createTime desc;;allow,all
default;;select s from SystemLanguage s order by s.isDefault desc,s.status desc,s.sortOrder asc;;allow,all
active;;select s from SystemLanguage s where s.status=1 order by s.isDefault desc,s.sortOrder asc;;disallow,COL@s.localeCode@String@LIKE
default;;select s from AppAudit s order by s.appAuditId desc;;allow,all

byUserName;;select s from AppAudit s where s.procUserId in (select a.appuserId from AppUser a where a.firstname like ? or a.lastname like ? or concat( a.firstname,' ',a.lastname) like ?) order by s.appAuditId desc;;allow,all;;hidden
default;;select s from PaymentHistory s order by s.paymentHistoryId desc;;allow,all
default;;select s from Content s order by s.contentTitle asc;;allow,all
front_default;;select s from Product s where s.status=1;;allow,all
default;;select s from ProductReview s where s.reviewId is null order by s.createTime desc;;allow,all
sf_productReviewList;;from ProductReview pr where pr.store.storeId=? and pr.product.productId=? and pr.reviewId is null and pr.status=1 order by pr.createTime desc;;allow,all;;hidden
sf_myReviews;;from ProductReview s where s.store.storeId=? and s.reviewUser.appuserId =? order by s.createTime desc;;allow,all;;hidden
sf_newReviews;;select s from ProductReview s where s.store.storeId=? and s.reviewId is null and s.status=1 order by s.createTime desc;;allow,all;;hidden
default_product_price;;select s from ProductSku s where (s.product.status=1 or s.product.status=2);;allow,all
default;;select s from InventoryAudit s order by s.inventoryAuditId desc;;allow,all
inventoryInventoryAudit;;select s from InventoryAudit s where s.inventory.inventoryId=? order by s.inventoryAuditId desc;;allow,all;;hidden
default;;select s from PromoRule s order by s.promoRuleId desc;;allow,all
promoRule_doing;;select s from PromoRule s where startTime < now() and (now() < endTime or endTime is null) by s.promoRuleId desc;;allow,all
promoRule_future;;select s from PromoRule s where startTime > now() and (endTime > now() or endTime is null) by s.promoRuleId desc;;allow,all
promoRule_past;;select s from PromoRule s where endTime < now() by s.promoRuleId desc;;allow,all
default;;select s from ShoppingcartItem s order by s.addTime desc;;allow,all
statItem;;select s from ShoppingcartItemStat s where s.itemType=1 and s.isSaved=0 order by quantity desc;;allow,all
statSaved;;select s from ShoppingcartItemStat s where s.itemType=1 and s.isSaved=1 order by quantity desc;;allow,all
default;;select so from SalesOrder so order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all

awaitingRobotConfirming;;select distinct so from SalesOrder so, OrderShipment os where so.salesOrderId = os.salesOrder.salesOrderId and so.paymentStatus = 30 and os.status = 20 and so.isOnHold = 0 order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
ask4Cancel;;select so from SalesOrder so where so.isOnHold = 1 and isHoldByCustomer = 1 order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
awaitingPicking;;select distinct so from SalesOrder so, OrderShipment os where so.salesOrderId = os.salesOrder.salesOrderId and os.status = 40 order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
hasProblem;;select distinct so from SalesOrder so where so.hasProblem = 1 order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
picking;;select distinct so from SalesOrder so, OrderShipment os where so.salesOrderId = os.salesOrder.salesOrderId and os.status = 50 order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
partiallyShipped;;select so from SalesOrder so where so.orderStatus = 20 order by s.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
partiallyPaid;;select so from SalesOrder so where so.paymentStatus = 20 and so.orderStatus != 80 order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
finished;;select so from SalesOrder so where so.orderStatus = 30 order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
confirmedByRobot;;select distinct so from SalesOrder so, OrderShipment os where so.salesOrderId = os.salesOrder.salesOrderId and os.isConfirmedByRobot = 1 order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
byPaymentType;;select distinct so from SalesOrder so, OrderPayment op where so.salesOrderId = op.salesOrder.salesOrderId and op.transactionType=? order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
sf_all;;select so from SalesOrder so where so.customer.appuserId=? and so.store.storeId=? order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
sf_specialNo;;select so from SalesOrder so where so.customer.appuserId=? and orderNo=? and so.store.storeId=? order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
sf_cancel;;select so from SalesOrder so where so.customer.appuserId=? and so.orderStatus = 80 and so.store.storeId=? order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
newMessages;;select distinct om.salesOrder from OrderMessage om where om.status = 0 and om.customerId=om.createBy order by om.orderMessageId desc;;allow,all
sf_default;;select so from SalesOrder so where so.customer.appuserId=? and so.createTime >= ? and so.store.storeId=? order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
ordreList4CustomerView;;select so from SalesOrder so where so.customer.appuserId=? order by so.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
default;;select s from OrderPickList s order by s.orderPickListId desc;;allow,all
selectByUser;;select s from OrderPickList s,AppUser u where s.createBy=u.appuserId;;allow,all;;hidden
orderShipment;;select s from OrderShipment s order by s.orderShipmentId desc;;allow,all
default;;select s from OrderReturn s order by s.orderReturnId desc;;allow,all
default;;select s from OrderSettlement s order by s.orderSettlementId desc;;allow,all
sf_customerMsg;;select s from OrderMessage s where s.customerId=? order by s.salesOrder.salesOrderId desc, s.orderMessageId asc;;allow,all
sf_allActiveOrders;;select s from SalesOrder s where s.customer.appuserId=? and s.orderStatus != 30 and s.orderStatus != 80 order by s.salesOrderId desc;;allow,all
default;;select s from SystemQueue s order by systemQueueId desc;;allow,all
default;;select s from Address s where s.appUser.appuserId=?;;allow,all
customerAddress_front;;select s from Address s where s.appUser.appuserId=?;;allow,all
sf_myFavorites;;from Favorite s where s.store.storeId=? and s.customer.appuserId =? order by s.createTime desc;;allow,all;;hidden
default;;select s from Feedback s where s.threadId=0 order by s.feedbackId desc;;allow,all
allReplaysByThreadId;;select s from Feedback s where s.threadId=? order by createTime asc;;allow,all;;hidden
default;;select s from Membership s order by s.membershipLevel;;allow,all
default;;select s from ShopPointHistory s where s.customer.appuserId=? order by s.createTime desc;;allow,all
default;;select s from Wishlist s where s.customer.appuserId=?;;allow,all
userSelector;;select s from AppUser s where s.status=1 and s.deleted=0 and s.userType=? order by s.username asc;;allow,all;;hidden
default;;select s from SupplierProduct s order by s.supplierProductId desc;;allow,all
supplierProduct;;select s from SupplierProduct s where s.status!=3 and s.supplier.supplierId=? order by s.supplierProductId desc;;allow,all;;hidden
default;;select s from PurchaseOrder s order by s.purchaseOrderId desc;;allow,all
sf_all;; select s from PurchaseOrder s where s.supplier.supplierId=? and s.poStatus != 0 order by s.purchaseOrderId desc;;allow,all;;hidden
sf_specialNo;;select s from PurchaseOrder s where s.supplier.supplierId=? and s.poStatus != 0 and purchaseOrderNo=? order by s.purchaseOrderId desc;;allow,all;;hidden
sf_cancel;; select s from PurchaseOrder s where s.supplier.supplierId=? and s.poStatus = 4 order by s.purchaseOrderId desc;;allow,all;;hidden
sf_default;; select s from PurchaseOrder s where s.supplier.supplierId=? and s.poStatus != 0 and s.createTime >= ? order by s.purchaseOrderId desc;;allow,all;;hidden
default;;select s from TransferRecord s order by s.transferRecordId desc;;allow,all
unprocessed;;select s from TransferRecord s where s.status=0 order by s.transferRecordId desc;;allow,all
